Then some soldiers asked him, “And what should we do?” 
“Do not take money by force or false accusation,” he said. “Be content with your wages.”

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Jesus got into the boat belonging to Simon and asked him to put out a little from shore. And sitting down, He taught the people from the boat.

contentJson: ["When Jesus had finished speaking, He said to Simon, “Put out into deep water and let down your nets for a catch.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When Jesus had finished speaking, He said to Simon, “Put out into deep water and let down your nets for a catch.”

contentJson: ["“Master,” Simon replied, “we have worked hard all night without catching anything. But because You say so, I will let down the nets.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Master,” Simon replied, “we have worked hard all night without catching anything. But because You say so, I will let down the nets.”

contentJson: ["When they had done so, they caught such a large number of fish that their nets began to tear."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When they had done so, they caught such a large number of fish that their nets began to tear.

contentJson: ["So they signaled to their partners in the other boat to come and help them, and they came and filled both boats so full that they began to sink."]

text: So they signaled to their partners in the other boat to come and help them, and they came and filled both boats so full that they began to sink.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When Simon Peter saw this, he fell at Jesus’ knees. “Go away from me, Lord,” he said, “for I am a sinful man.”

contentJson: ["For he and his companions were astonished at the catch of fish they had taken,"]

and so were his partners James and John, the sons of Zebedee. 
“Do not be afraid,” Jesus said to Simon. “From now on you will catch men.”

contentJson: ["While Jesus was in one of the towns, a man came along who was covered with leprosy.",{"noteId":33},"When he saw Jesus, he fell facedown and begged Him, “Lord, if You are willing, You can make me clean.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: While Jesus was in one of the towns, a man came along who was covered with leprosy. When he saw Jesus, he fell facedown and begged Him, “Lord, if You are willing, You can make me clean.”

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Jesus reached out His hand and touched the man. “I am willing,” He said. “Be clean!” And immediately the leprosy left him.

text: “Do not tell anyone,” Jesus instructed him. “But go, show yourself to the priest and present the offering Moses prescribed for your cleansing, as a testimony to them.”

contentJson: ["He also told them a parable: “No one tears a piece of cloth from a new garment and sews it on an old one. If he does, he will tear the new garment as well, and the patch from the new will not match the old."]

text: Instead, new wine is poured into new wineskins.

contentJson: ["And no one after drinking old wine wants new, for he says, ‘The old is better.’”"]

text: So John called two of his disciples and sent them to ask the Lord, “Are You the One who was to come, or should we look for someone else?”

contentJson: ["So He replied, “Go back and report to John what you have seen and heard: The blind receive sight, the lame walk, the lepers",{"noteId":40},"are cleansed, the deaf hear, the dead are raised, and the good news is preached to the poor."]

text: Blessed is the one who does not fall away on account of Me. ”

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: What then did you go out to see? A prophet? Yes, I tell you, and more than a prophet.

contentJson: ["This is the one about whom it is written:",{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"‘Behold, I will send My messenger ahead of You,","poem":1},{"text":"who will prepare Your way before You.’","poem":2},{"noteId":42}]

text:
This is the one about whom it is written: 
‘Behold, I will send My messenger ahead of You, who will prepare Your way before You.’

contentJson: ["I tell you, among those born of women there is no one greater than John, yet even the least in the kingdom of God is greater than he.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I tell you, among those born of women there is no one greater than John, yet even the least in the kingdom of God is greater than he.”

contentJson: ["All the people who heard this, even the tax collectors, acknowledged God’s justice. For they had received the baptism of John."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All the people who heard this, even the tax collectors, acknowledged God’s justice. For they had received the baptism of John.

contentJson: ["But the Pharisees and experts in the law rejected God’s purpose for themselves, because they had not been baptized by John."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But the Pharisees and experts in the law rejected God’s purpose for themselves, because they had not been baptized by John.

contentJson: ["“To what, then, can I compare the men of this generation? What are they like?"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “To what, then, can I compare the men of this generation? What are they like?

contentJson: ["They are like children sitting in the marketplace and calling out to one another:",{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"‘We played the flute for you,","poem":1},{"text":"and you did not dance;","poem":2},{"text":"we sang a dirge,","poem":1},{"text":"and you did not weep.’","poem":2}]

‘We played the flute for you, and you did not dance; we sang a dirge, and you did not weep.’

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When the Pharisee who had invited Jesus saw this, he said to himself, “If this man were a prophet, He would know who this is and what kind of woman is touching Him—for she is a sinner!”

name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
But Jesus answered him, “Simon, I have something to tell you.” 
“Tell me, Teacher,” he said.

contentJson: ["“Two men were debtors to a certain moneylender. One owed him five hundred denarii,",{"noteId":43},"and the other fifty."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Two men were debtors to a certain moneylender. One owed him five hundred denarii, and the other fifty.

contentJson: ["When they were unable to repay him, he forgave both of them. Which one, then, will love him more?”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When they were unable to repay him, he forgave both of them. Which one, then, will love him more?”

contentJson: ["“I suppose the one who was forgiven more,” Simon replied.",{"lineBreak":true},"“You have judged correctly,” Jesus said."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
“I suppose the one who was forgiven more,” Simon replied. 
“You have judged correctly,” Jesus said.

contentJson: ["And turning toward the woman, He said to Simon, “Do you see this woman? When I entered your house, you did not give Me water for My feet, but she wet My feet with her tears and wiped them with her hair."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And turning toward the woman, He said to Simon, “Do you see this woman? When I entered your house, you did not give Me water for My feet, but she wet My feet with her tears and wiped them with her hair.

contentJson: ["You did not greet Me with a kiss, but she has not stopped kissing My feet since I arrived."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You did not greet Me with a kiss, but she has not stopped kissing My feet since I arrived.

contentJson: ["You did not anoint My head with oil, but she has anointed My feet with perfume."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You did not anoint My head with oil, but she has anointed My feet with perfume.

contentJson: ["Therefore I tell you, because her many sins have been forgiven, she has loved much. But he who has been forgiven little loves little.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore I tell you, because her many sins have been forgiven, she has loved much. But he who has been forgiven little loves little.”

contentJson: ["Then Jesus said to her, “Your sins are forgiven.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then Jesus said to her, “Your sins are forgiven.”

contentJson: ["But those at the table began to say to themselves, “Who is this who even forgives sins?”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But those at the table began to say to themselves, “Who is this who even forgives sins?”

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And Jesus told the woman, “Your faith has saved you; go in peace.”

contentJson: ["While a large crowd was gathering and people were coming to Jesus from town after town, He told them this parable:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: While a large crowd was gathering and people were coming to Jesus from town after town, He told them this parable:

contentJson: ["“A farmer went out to sow his seed. And as he was sowing, some seed fell along the path, where it was trampled, and the birds of the air devoured it."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “A farmer went out to sow his seed. And as he was sowing, some seed fell along the path, where it was trampled, and the birds of the air devoured it.

contentJson: ["Some fell on rocky ground, and when it came up, the seedlings withered because they had no moisture."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Some fell on rocky ground, and when it came up, the seedlings withered because they had no moisture.

contentJson: ["Other seed fell among thorns, which grew up with it and choked the seedlings."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Other seed fell among thorns, which grew up with it and choked the seedlings.

contentJson: ["Still other seed fell on good soil, where it sprang up and produced a crop—a hundredfold.”",{"lineBreak":true},"As Jesus said this, He called out, “He who has ears to hear, let him hear.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Still other seed fell on good soil, where it sprang up and produced a crop—a hundredfold.” 
As Jesus said this, He called out, “He who has ears to hear, let him hear.”

contentJson: ["Then His disciples asked Him what this parable meant."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then His disciples asked Him what this parable meant.

contentJson: ["He replied, “The knowledge of the mysteries of the kingdom of God has been given to you, but to others I speak in parables, so that,",{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"‘though seeing, they may not see;","poem":1},{"text":"though hearing, they may not understand.’","poem":2},{"noteId":45}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He replied, “The knowledge of the mysteries of the kingdom of God has been given to you, but to others I speak in parables, so that, 
‘though seeing, they may not see; though hearing, they may not understand.’

contentJson: ["Now this is the meaning of the parable: The seed is the word of God."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Now this is the meaning of the parable: The seed is the word of God.

contentJson: ["The seeds",{"noteId":46},"along the path are those who hear, but the devil comes and takes away the word from their hearts, so that they may not believe and be saved."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The seeds along the path are those who hear, but the devil comes and takes away the word from their hearts, so that they may not believe and be saved.

contentJson: ["The seeds on rocky ground are those who hear the word and receive it with joy, but they have no root. They believe for a season, but in the time of testing, they fall away."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The seeds on rocky ground are those who hear the word and receive it with joy, but they have no root. They believe for a season, but in the time of testing, they fall away.

contentJson: ["The seeds that fell among the thorns are those who hear, but as they go on their way, they are choked by the worries, riches, and pleasures of this life, and their fruit does not mature."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The seeds that fell among the thorns are those who hear, but as they go on their way, they are choked by the worries, riches, and pleasures of this life, and their fruit does not mature.

contentJson: ["But the seeds on good soil are those with a noble and good heart, who hear the word, cling to it, and by persevering produce a crop."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But the seeds on good soil are those with a noble and good heart, who hear the word, cling to it, and by persevering produce a crop.

contentJson: ["No one lights a lamp and covers it with a jar or puts it under a bed. Instead, he sets it on a stand, so those who enter can see the light."]

text: No one lights a lamp and covers it with a jar or puts it under a bed. Instead, he sets it on a stand, so those who enter can see the light.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For there is nothing hidden that will not be disclosed, and nothing concealed that will not be made known and brought to light.

contentJson: ["Pay attention, therefore, to how you listen. Whoever has will be given more, but whoever does not have, even what he thinks he has will be taken away from him.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Pay attention, therefore, to how you listen. Whoever has will be given more, but whoever does not have, even what he thinks he has will be taken away from him.”

contentJson: ["One day Jesus said to His disciples, “Let us cross to the other side of the lake.” So He got into a boat with them and set out."]

text: One day Jesus said to His disciples, “Let us cross to the other side of the lake.” So He got into a boat with them and set out.

contentJson: ["The disciples went and woke Him, saying, “Master, Master, we are perishing!”",{"lineBreak":true},"Then Jesus got up and rebuked the wind and the raging waters, and they subsided, and all was calm."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The disciples went and woke Him, saying, “Master, Master, we are perishing!” 
Then Jesus got up and rebuked the wind and the raging waters, and they subsided, and all was calm.

contentJson: ["“Where is your faith?” He asked.",{"lineBreak":true},"Frightened and amazed, they asked one another, “Who is this? He commands even the winds and the water, and they obey Him!”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
“Where is your faith?” He asked. 
Frightened and amazed, they asked one another, “Who is this? He commands even the winds and the water, and they obey Him!”

contentJson: ["Then they sailed to the region of the Gerasenes,",{"noteId":47},"across the lake from Galilee."]

text: Knowing their thoughts, Jesus said to them, “Every kingdom divided against itself will be laid waste, and a house divided against a house will fall.

contentJson: ["If Satan is divided against himself, how can his kingdom stand? After all, you say that I drive out demons by Beelzebul."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If Satan is divided against himself, how can his kingdom stand? After all, you say that I drive out demons by Beelzebul.

contentJson: ["And if I drive out demons by Beelzebul, by whom do your sons drive them out? So then, they will be your judges."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And if I drive out demons by Beelzebul, by whom do your sons drive them out? So then, they will be your judges.

contentJson: ["But if I drive out demons by the finger of God, then the kingdom of God has come upon you."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But if I drive out demons by the finger of God, then the kingdom of God has come upon you.

contentJson: ["When a strong man, fully armed, guards his house, his possessions are secure."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When a strong man, fully armed, guards his house, his possessions are secure.

contentJson: ["But when someone stronger attacks and overpowers him, he takes away the armor in which the man trusted, and then he divides up his plunder."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But when someone stronger attacks and overpowers him, he takes away the armor in which the man trusted, and then he divides up his plunder.

contentJson: ["He who is not with Me is against Me, and he who does not gather with Me scatters."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who is not with Me is against Me, and he who does not gather with Me scatters.

contentJson: ["When an unclean spirit comes out of a man, it passes through arid places seeking rest and does not find it. Then it says, ‘I will return to the house I left.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When an unclean spirit comes out of a man, it passes through arid places seeking rest and does not find it. Then it says, ‘I will return to the house I left.’

contentJson: ["On its return, it finds the house swept clean and put in order."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: On its return, it finds the house swept clean and put in order.

contentJson: ["Then it goes and brings seven other spirits more wicked than itself, and they go in and dwell there. And the final plight of that man is worse than the first.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then it goes and brings seven other spirits more wicked than itself, and they go in and dwell there. And the final plight of that man is worse than the first.”

contentJson: ["As Jesus was saying these things, a woman in the crowd raised her voice and said, “Blessed is the womb that bore You, and blessed are the breasts that nursed You!”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As Jesus was saying these things, a woman in the crowd raised her voice and said, “Blessed is the womb that bore You, and blessed are the breasts that nursed You!”

contentJson: ["But He replied, “Blessed rather are those who hear the word of God and obey it.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But He replied, “Blessed rather are those who hear the word of God and obey it.”

contentJson: ["As the crowds were increasing, Jesus said, “This is a wicked generation. It demands a sign, but none will be given it except the sign of Jonah."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As the crowds were increasing, Jesus said, “This is a wicked generation. It demands a sign, but none will be given it except the sign of Jonah.

contentJson: ["For as Jonah was a sign to the Ninevites, so the Son of Man will be a sign to this generation."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For as Jonah was a sign to the Ninevites, so the Son of Man will be a sign to this generation.

contentJson: ["The Queen of the South will rise at the judgment with the men of this generation and condemn them; for she came from the ends of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon, and now One greater than Solomon is here."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The Queen of the South will rise at the judgment with the men of this generation and condemn them; for she came from the ends of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon, and now One greater than Solomon is here.

contentJson: ["The men of Nineveh will stand at the judgment with this generation and condemn it; for they repented at the preaching of Jonah, and now One greater than Jonah is here."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The men of Nineveh will stand at the judgment with this generation and condemn it; for they repented at the preaching of Jonah, and now One greater than Jonah is here.

contentJson: ["No one lights a lamp and puts it in a cellar or under a basket. Instead, he sets it on a stand, so those who enter can see the light."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: No one lights a lamp and puts it in a cellar or under a basket. Instead, he sets it on a stand, so those who enter can see the light.

contentJson: ["Your eye is the lamp of your body. When your eyes are good,",{"noteId":66},"your whole body also is full of light. But when they are bad,",{"noteId":67},"your body is full of darkness."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your eye is the lamp of your body. When your eyes are good, your whole body also is full of light. But when they are bad, your body is full of darkness.

contentJson: ["Be careful, then, that the light within you is not darkness."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be careful, then, that the light within you is not darkness.

contentJson: ["So if your whole body is full of light, with no part of it in darkness, you will be radiant, as though a lamp were shining on you.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So if your whole body is full of light, with no part of it in darkness, you will be radiant, as though a lamp were shining on you.”

contentJson: ["As Jesus was speaking, a Pharisee invited Him to dine with him; so He went in and reclined at the table."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As Jesus was speaking, a Pharisee invited Him to dine with him; so He went in and reclined at the table.

contentJson: ["But the Pharisee was surprised to see that Jesus did not first wash before the meal."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But the Pharisee was surprised to see that Jesus did not first wash before the meal.

contentJson: ["“Now then,” said the Lord, “you Pharisees clean the outside of the cup and dish, but inside you are full of greed and wickedness."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Now then,” said the Lord, “you Pharisees clean the outside of the cup and dish, but inside you are full of greed and wickedness.

contentJson: ["You fools! Did not the One who made the outside make the inside as well?"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You fools! Did not the One who made the outside make the inside as well?

contentJson: ["But give as alms the things that are within you, and you will see that everything is clean for you."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But give as alms the things that are within you, and you will see that everything is clean for you.

contentJson: ["Woe to you Pharisees! You pay tithes of mint, rue, and every herb, but you disregard justice and the love of God. You should have practiced the latter without neglecting the former."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Woe to you Pharisees! You pay tithes of mint, rue, and every herb, but you disregard justice and the love of God. You should have practiced the latter without neglecting the former.

contentJson: ["Woe to you Pharisees! You love the chief seats in the synagogues and the greetings in the marketplaces."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Woe to you Pharisees! You love the chief seats in the synagogues and the greetings in the marketplaces.

contentJson: ["Woe to you! For you are like unmarked graves, which men walk over without even noticing.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Woe to you! For you are like unmarked graves, which men walk over without even noticing.”

contentJson: ["One of the experts in the law told Him, “Teacher, when You say these things, You insult us as well.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: One of the experts in the law told Him, “Teacher, when You say these things, You insult us as well.”

contentJson: ["“Woe to you as well, experts in the law!” He replied. “You weigh men down with heavy burdens, but you yourselves will not lift a finger to lighten their load."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Woe to you as well, experts in the law!” He replied. “You weigh men down with heavy burdens, but you yourselves will not lift a finger to lighten their load.

contentJson: ["Woe to you! You build tombs for the prophets, but it was your fathers who killed them."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Woe to you! You build tombs for the prophets, but it was your fathers who killed them.

contentJson: ["So you are witnesses consenting to the deeds of your fathers: They killed the prophets, and you build their tombs."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So you are witnesses consenting to the deeds of your fathers: They killed the prophets, and you build their tombs.

contentJson: ["Because of this, the wisdom of God said, ‘I will send them prophets and apostles; some of them they will kill and others they will persecute.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Because of this, the wisdom of God said, ‘I will send them prophets and apostles; some of them they will kill and others they will persecute.’

contentJson: ["As a result, this generation will be charged with the blood of all the prophets that has been shed since the foundation of the world,"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As a result, this generation will be charged with the blood of all the prophets that has been shed since the foundation of the world,

contentJson: ["from the blood of Abel to the blood of Zechariah, who was killed between the altar and the sanctuary.",{"noteId":68},"Yes, I tell you, all of it will be charged to this generation."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: from the blood of Abel to the blood of Zechariah, who was killed between the altar and the sanctuary. Yes, I tell you, all of it will be charged to this generation.

contentJson: ["Woe to you experts in the law! For you have taken away the key to knowledge. You yourselves have not entered, and you have hindered those who were entering.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Woe to you experts in the law! For you have taken away the key to knowledge. You yourselves have not entered, and you have hindered those who were entering.”

contentJson: ["As Jesus went on from there, the scribes and Pharisees began to oppose Him bitterly and to ply Him with questions about many things,"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As Jesus went on from there, the scribes and Pharisees began to oppose Him bitterly and to ply Him with questions about many things,

contentJson: ["waiting to catch Him in something He might say."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: waiting to catch Him in something He might say.

contentJson: ["In the meantime, a crowd of many thousands had gathered, so that they were trampling one another. Jesus began to speak first to His disciples: “Beware of the leaven of the Pharisees, which is hypocrisy."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In the meantime, a crowd of many thousands had gathered, so that they were trampling one another. Jesus began to speak first to His disciples: “Beware of the leaven of the Pharisees, which is hypocrisy.

contentJson: ["There is nothing concealed that will not be disclosed, and nothing hidden that will not be made known."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There is nothing concealed that will not be disclosed, and nothing hidden that will not be made known.

contentJson: ["What you have spoken in the dark will be heard in the daylight, and what you have whispered in the inner rooms will be proclaimed from the housetops."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: What you have spoken in the dark will be heard in the daylight, and what you have whispered in the inner rooms will be proclaimed from the housetops.

contentJson: ["I tell you, My friends, do not be afraid of those who kill the body and after that can do no more."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I tell you, My friends, do not be afraid of those who kill the body and after that can do no more.

contentJson: ["But I will show you whom you should fear: Fear the One who, after you have been killed, has authority to throw you into hell.",{"noteId":69},"Yes, I tell you, fear Him!"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I will show you whom you should fear: Fear the One who, after you have been killed, has authority to throw you into hell. Yes, I tell you, fear Him!

contentJson: ["Are not five sparrows sold for two pennies?",{"noteId":70},"Yet not one of them is forgotten by God."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Are not five sparrows sold for two pennies? Yet not one of them is forgotten by God.

contentJson: ["And even the very hairs of your head are all numbered. So do not be afraid; you are worth more than many sparrows."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And even the very hairs of your head are all numbered. So do not be afraid; you are worth more than many sparrows.

contentJson: ["I tell you, everyone who confesses Me before men, the Son of Man will also confess him before the angels of God."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I tell you, everyone who confesses Me before men, the Son of Man will also confess him before the angels of God.

contentJson: ["But whoever denies Me before men will be denied before the angels of God."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But whoever denies Me before men will be denied before the angels of God.

contentJson: ["And everyone who speaks a word against the Son of Man will be forgiven, but whoever blasphemes against the Holy Spirit will not be forgiven."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And everyone who speaks a word against the Son of Man will be forgiven, but whoever blasphemes against the Holy Spirit will not be forgiven.

contentJson: ["When you are brought before synagogues, rulers, and authorities, do not worry about how to defend yourselves or what to say."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When you are brought before synagogues, rulers, and authorities, do not worry about how to defend yourselves or what to say.

contentJson: ["For at that time the Holy Spirit will teach you what you should say.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For at that time the Holy Spirit will teach you what you should say.”

contentJson: ["Someone in the crowd said to Him, “Teacher, tell my brother to divide the inheritance with me.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Someone in the crowd said to Him, “Teacher, tell my brother to divide the inheritance with me.”

contentJson: ["But Jesus replied, “Man, who appointed Me judge or executor between you?”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But Jesus replied, “Man, who appointed Me judge or executor between you?”

contentJson: ["And He said to them, “Watch out! Guard yourselves against every form of greed, for one’s life does not consist in the abundance of his possessions.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And He said to them, “Watch out! Guard yourselves against every form of greed, for one’s life does not consist in the abundance of his possessions.”

contentJson: ["Then He told them a parable: “The ground of a certain rich man produced an abundance."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then He told them a parable: “The ground of a certain rich man produced an abundance.

contentJson: ["So he thought to himself, ‘What shall I do, since I have nowhere to store my crops?’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So he thought to himself, ‘What shall I do, since I have nowhere to store my crops?’

contentJson: ["Then he said, ‘This is what I will do: I will tear down my barns and will build bigger ones, and there I will store up all my grain and my goods."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then he said, ‘This is what I will do: I will tear down my barns and will build bigger ones, and there I will store up all my grain and my goods.

contentJson: ["Then I will say to myself, “You have plenty of good things laid up for many years. Take it easy. Eat, drink, and be merry!”’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then I will say to myself, “You have plenty of good things laid up for many years. Take it easy. Eat, drink, and be merry!”’

contentJson: ["But God said to him, ‘You fool! This very night your life will be required of you. Then who will own what you have accumulated?’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But God said to him, ‘You fool! This very night your life will be required of you. Then who will own what you have accumulated?’

contentJson: ["This is how it will be for anyone who stores up treasure for himself but is not rich toward God.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: This is how it will be for anyone who stores up treasure for himself but is not rich toward God.”

contentJson: ["Then Jesus said to His disciples, “Therefore I tell you, do not worry about your life, what you will eat, or about your body, what you will wear."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then Jesus said to His disciples, “Therefore I tell you, do not worry about your life, what you will eat, or about your body, what you will wear.

contentJson: ["For life is more than food, and the body more than clothes."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For life is more than food, and the body more than clothes.

contentJson: ["Consider the ravens: They do not sow or reap, they have no storehouse or barn; yet God feeds them. How much more valuable you are than the birds!"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Consider the ravens: They do not sow or reap, they have no storehouse or barn; yet God feeds them. How much more valuable you are than the birds!

contentJson: ["Who of you by worrying can add a single hour to his life?",{"noteId":71}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who of you by worrying can add a single hour to his life?

contentJson: ["So if you cannot do such a small thing, why do you worry about the rest?"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So if you cannot do such a small thing, why do you worry about the rest?

contentJson: ["Consider how the lilies grow: They do not labor or spin.",{"noteId":72},"Yet I tell you, not even Solomon in all his glory was adorned like one of these."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Consider how the lilies grow: They do not labor or spin. Yet I tell you, not even Solomon in all his glory was adorned like one of these.

contentJson: ["If that is how God clothes the grass of the field, which is here today and tomorrow is thrown into the furnace, how much more will He clothe you, O you of little faith!"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If that is how God clothes the grass of the field, which is here today and tomorrow is thrown into the furnace, how much more will He clothe you, O you of little faith!

contentJson: ["And do not be concerned about what you will eat or drink. Do not worry about it."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And do not be concerned about what you will eat or drink. Do not worry about it.

contentJson: ["For the Gentiles of the world strive after all these things, and your Father knows that you need them."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the Gentiles of the world strive after all these things, and your Father knows that you need them.

contentJson: ["But seek His",{"noteId":73},"kingdom, and these things will be added unto you."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But seek His kingdom, and these things will be added unto you.

contentJson: ["Do not be afraid, little flock, for your Father is pleased to give you the kingdom."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not be afraid, little flock, for your Father is pleased to give you the kingdom.

contentJson: ["Sell your possessions and give to the poor. Provide yourselves with purses that will not wear out, an inexhaustible treasure in heaven, where no thief approaches and no moth destroys."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sell your possessions and give to the poor. Provide yourselves with purses that will not wear out, an inexhaustible treasure in heaven, where no thief approaches and no moth destroys.

contentJson: ["For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also.

contentJson: ["Be dressed for service and keep your lamps burning."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be dressed for service and keep your lamps burning.

contentJson: ["Then you will be like servants waiting for their master to return from the wedding banquet, so that when he comes and knocks, they can open the door for him at once."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then you will be like servants waiting for their master to return from the wedding banquet, so that when he comes and knocks, they can open the door for him at once.

contentJson: ["Blessed are those servants whom the master finds on watch when he returns. Truly I tell you, he will dress himself to serve and will have them recline at the table, and he himself will come and wait on them."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed are those servants whom the master finds on watch when he returns. Truly I tell you, he will dress himself to serve and will have them recline at the table, and he himself will come and wait on them.

contentJson: ["Even if he comes in the second or third watch of the night",{"noteId":74},"and finds them alert, those servants will be blessed."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Even if he comes in the second or third watch of the night and finds them alert, those servants will be blessed.

contentJson: ["But understand this: If the homeowner had known at what hour the thief was coming,",{"noteId":75},"he would not have let his house be broken into."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But understand this: If the homeowner had known at what hour the thief was coming, he would not have let his house be broken into.

contentJson: ["You also must be ready, because the Son of Man will come at an hour you do not expect.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You also must be ready, because the Son of Man will come at an hour you do not expect.”

contentJson: ["“Lord,” said Peter, “are You addressing this parable to us, or to everyone else as well?”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Lord,” said Peter, “are You addressing this parable to us, or to everyone else as well?”

contentJson: ["And the Lord answered, “Who then is the faithful and wise manager, whom the master puts in charge of his servants to give them their portion at the proper time?"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And the Lord answered, “Who then is the faithful and wise manager, whom the master puts in charge of his servants to give them their portion at the proper time?

contentJson: ["Blessed is that servant whose master finds him doing so when he returns."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed is that servant whose master finds him doing so when he returns.

contentJson: ["Truly I tell you, he will put him in charge of all his possessions."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Truly I tell you, he will put him in charge of all his possessions.

contentJson: ["But suppose that servant says in his heart, ‘My master will be a long time in coming,’ and he begins to beat the menservants and maidservants, and to eat and drink and get drunk."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But suppose that servant says in his heart, ‘My master will be a long time in coming,’ and he begins to beat the menservants and maidservants, and to eat and drink and get drunk.

contentJson: ["The master of that servant will come on a day he does not expect and at an hour he does not anticipate. Then he will cut him to pieces and assign him a place with the unbelievers."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The master of that servant will come on a day he does not expect and at an hour he does not anticipate. Then he will cut him to pieces and assign him a place with the unbelievers.

contentJson: ["That servant who knows his master’s will but does not get ready or follow his instructions will be beaten with many blows."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: That servant who knows his master’s will but does not get ready or follow his instructions will be beaten with many blows.

contentJson: ["But the one who unknowingly does things worthy of punishment will be beaten with few blows. From everyone who has been given much, much will be required; and from him who has been entrusted with much, even more will be demanded."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But the one who unknowingly does things worthy of punishment will be beaten with few blows. From everyone who has been given much, much will be required; and from him who has been entrusted with much, even more will be demanded.

contentJson: ["I have come to ignite a fire on the earth, and how I wish it were already kindled!"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have come to ignite a fire on the earth, and how I wish it were already kindled!

contentJson: ["But I have a baptism to undergo, and how distressed I am until it is accomplished!"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I have a baptism to undergo, and how distressed I am until it is accomplished!

contentJson: ["Do you think that I have come to bring peace to the earth? No, I tell you, but division."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do you think that I have come to bring peace to the earth? No, I tell you, but division.

contentJson: ["From now on, five in one household will be divided, three against two and two against three."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: From now on, five in one household will be divided, three against two and two against three.

contentJson: ["They will be divided, father against son and son against father, mother against daughter and daughter against mother, mother-in-law against daughter-in-law and daughter-in-law against mother-in-law.",{"noteId":76},"”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: ["Then Jesus said to the crowds, “As soon as you see a cloud rising in the west, you say, ‘A shower is coming,’ and that is what happens."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then Jesus said to the crowds, “As soon as you see a cloud rising in the west, you say, ‘A shower is coming,’ and that is what happens.

contentJson: ["And when the south wind blows, you say, ‘It will be hot,’ and it is."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And when the south wind blows, you say, ‘It will be hot,’ and it is.

contentJson: ["You hypocrites! You know how to interpret the appearance of the earth and sky. Why don’t you know how to interpret the present time?"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You hypocrites! You know how to interpret the appearance of the earth and sky. Why don’t you know how to interpret the present time?

contentJson: ["And why don’t you judge for yourselves what is right?"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And why don’t you judge for yourselves what is right?

contentJson: ["Make every effort to reconcile with your adversary while you are on your way to the magistrate. Otherwise, he may drag you off to the judge, and the judge may hand you over to the officer, and the officer may throw you into prison."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Make every effort to reconcile with your adversary while you are on your way to the magistrate. Otherwise, he may drag you off to the judge, and the judge may hand you over to the officer, and the officer may throw you into prison.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I tell you, you will not get out until you have paid the very last penny. ”

contentJson: ["To this He replied, “Do you think that these Galileans were worse sinners than all the other Galileans, because they suffered this fate?"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: To this He replied, “Do you think that these Galileans were worse sinners than all the other Galileans, because they suffered this fate?

contentJson: ["No, I tell you. But unless you repent, you too will all perish."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: No, I tell you. But unless you repent, you too will all perish.

contentJson: ["Or those eighteen who were killed when the tower of Siloam collapsed on them: Do you think that they were more sinful than all the others living in Jerusalem?"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Or those eighteen who were killed when the tower of Siloam collapsed on them: Do you think that they were more sinful than all the others living in Jerusalem?

contentJson: ["No, I tell you. But unless you repent, you too will all perish.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: No, I tell you. But unless you repent, you too will all perish.”

contentJson: ["Then Jesus told this parable: “A man had a fig tree that was planted in his vineyard. He went to look for fruit on it, but did not find any."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then Jesus told this parable: “A man had a fig tree that was planted in his vineyard. He went to look for fruit on it, but did not find any.

contentJson: ["So he said to the keeper of the vineyard, ‘Look, for the past three years I have come to search for fruit on this fig tree and haven’t found any. Therefore cut it down!",{"noteId":78},"Why should it use up the soil?’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So he said to the keeper of the vineyard, ‘Look, for the past three years I have come to search for fruit on this fig tree and haven’t found any. Therefore cut it down! Why should it use up the soil?’

contentJson: ["‘Sir,’ the man replied, ‘leave it alone again this year, until I dig around it and fertilize it."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: ‘Sir,’ the man replied, ‘leave it alone again this year, until I dig around it and fertilize it.

contentJson: ["If it bears fruit next year, fine. But if not, you can cut it down.’”"]

text: If it bears fruit next year, fine. But if not, you can cut it down.’”

contentJson: ["One Sabbath Jesus was teaching in one of the synagogues,"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: One Sabbath Jesus was teaching in one of the synagogues,

text: When Jesus saw her, He called her over and said, “Woman, you are set free from your disability.”

text: “You hypocrites!” the Lord replied. “Does not each of you on the Sabbath untie his ox or donkey from the stall and lead it to water?

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then should not this daughter of Abraham, whom Satan has kept bound for eighteen long years, be released from her bondage on the Sabbath day?”

text: When Jesus said this, all His adversaries were humiliated. And the whole crowd rejoiced at all the glorious things He was doing.

contentJson: ["Then Jesus asked, “What is the kingdom of God like? To what can I compare it?"]

text: Then Jesus asked, “What is the kingdom of God like? To what can I compare it?

text: Again He asked, “To what can I compare the kingdom of God?

name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: ["Then Jesus traveled throughout the towns and villages, teaching as He made His way toward Jerusalem."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then Jesus traveled throughout the towns and villages, teaching as He made His way toward Jerusalem.

contentJson: ["“Lord,” someone asked Him, “will only a few people be saved?”",{"lineBreak":true},"Jesus answered,"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
“Lord,” someone asked Him, “will only a few people be saved?” 
Jesus answered,

contentJson: ["“Make every effort to enter through the narrow door. For many, I tell you, will try to enter and will not be able."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Make every effort to enter through the narrow door. For many, I tell you, will try to enter and will not be able.

contentJson: ["After the master of the house gets up and shuts the door, you will stand outside knocking and saying, ‘Lord, open the door for us.’",{"lineBreak":true},"But he will reply, ‘I do not know where you are from.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
After the master of the house gets up and shuts the door, you will stand outside knocking and saying, ‘Lord, open the door for us.’ 
But he will reply, ‘I do not know where you are from.’

contentJson: ["Then you will say, ‘We ate and drank with you, and you taught in our streets.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then you will say, ‘We ate and drank with you, and you taught in our streets.’

contentJson: ["And he will answer, ‘I tell you, I do not know where you are from. Depart from me, all you evildoers.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And he will answer, ‘I tell you, I do not know where you are from. Depart from me, all you evildoers.’

contentJson: ["There will be weeping and gnashing of teeth when you see Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and all the prophets in the kingdom of God, but you yourselves are thrown out."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There will be weeping and gnashing of teeth when you see Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and all the prophets in the kingdom of God, but you yourselves are thrown out.

contentJson: ["People will come from east and west and north and south, and will recline at the table in the kingdom of God."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: People will come from east and west and north and south, and will recline at the table in the kingdom of God.

contentJson: ["And indeed, some who are last will be first, and some who are first will be last.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And indeed, some who are last will be first, and some who are first will be last.”

text: At that very hour, some Pharisees came to Jesus and told Him, “Leave this place and get away, because Herod wants to kill You.”

contentJson: ["But Jesus replied, “Go tell that fox, ‘Look, I will keep driving out demons and healing people today and tomorrow, and on the third day I will reach My goal.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: ["Nevertheless, I must keep going today and tomorrow and the next day, for it is not admissible for a prophet to perish outside of Jerusalem."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Nevertheless, I must keep going today and tomorrow and the next day, for it is not admissible for a prophet to perish outside of Jerusalem.

contentJson: ["O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, who kills the prophets and stones those sent to her, how often I have longed to gather your children together as a hen gathers her chicks under her wings, but you were unwilling!"]
name: Berean Standard Bible

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Look, your house is left to you desolate. And I tell you that you will not see Me again until you say, ‘Blessed is He who comes in the name of the Lord.’ ”

contentJson: ["One Sabbath, Jesus went to eat in the home of a leading Pharisee, and those in attendance were watching Him closely."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: One Sabbath, Jesus went to eat in the home of a leading Pharisee, and those in attendance were watching Him closely.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Right there before Him was a man with dropsy.

name: Berean Standard Bible

But they remained silent. 
Then Jesus took hold of the man, healed him, and sent him on his way.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And He asked them, “Which of you whose son or ox falls into a pit on the Sabbath day will not immediately pull him out?”

contentJson: ["And they were unable to answer these questions."]
name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: ["When Jesus noticed how the guests chose the places of honor, He told them a parable:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When Jesus noticed how the guests chose the places of honor, He told them a parable:

contentJson: ["“When you are invited to a wedding banquet, do not sit in the place of honor, in case someone more distinguished than you has been invited."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “When you are invited to a wedding banquet, do not sit in the place of honor, in case someone more distinguished than you has been invited.

contentJson: ["Then the host who invited both of you will come and tell you, ‘Give this man your seat.’ And in humiliation, you will have to take the last place."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then the host who invited both of you will come and tell you, ‘Give this man your seat.’ And in humiliation, you will have to take the last place.

contentJson: ["But when you are invited, go and sit in the last place, so that your host will come and tell you, ‘Friend, move up to a better place.’",{"noteId":81},"Then you will be honored in front of everyone at the table with you."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But when you are invited, go and sit in the last place, so that your host will come and tell you, ‘Friend, move up to a better place.’ Then you will be honored in front of everyone at the table with you.

contentJson: ["For everyone who exalts himself will be humbled, and the one who humbles himself will be exalted.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For everyone who exalts himself will be humbled, and the one who humbles himself will be exalted.”

contentJson: ["Then Jesus said to the man who had invited Him, “When you host a dinner or a banquet, do not invite your friends or brothers or relatives or rich neighbors. Otherwise, they may invite you in return, and you will be repaid."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then Jesus said to the man who had invited Him, “When you host a dinner or a banquet, do not invite your friends or brothers or relatives or rich neighbors. Otherwise, they may invite you in return, and you will be repaid.

contentJson: ["But when you host a banquet, invite the poor, the crippled, the lame, and the blind,"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But when you host a banquet, invite the poor, the crippled, the lame, and the blind,

contentJson: ["and you will be blessed. Since they cannot repay you, you will be repaid at the resurrection of the righteous.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and you will be blessed. Since they cannot repay you, you will be repaid at the resurrection of the righteous.”

contentJson: ["When one of those reclining with Him heard this, he said to Jesus, “Blessed is everyone who will eat at the feast",{"noteId":82},"in the kingdom of God.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When one of those reclining with Him heard this, he said to Jesus, “Blessed is everyone who will eat at the feast in the kingdom of God.”

contentJson: ["But Jesus replied, “A certain man prepared a great banquet and invited many guests."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But Jesus replied, “A certain man prepared a great banquet and invited many guests.

contentJson: ["When it was time for the banquet, he sent his servant to tell those who had been invited, ‘Come, for everything is now ready.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When it was time for the banquet, he sent his servant to tell those who had been invited, ‘Come, for everything is now ready.’

contentJson: ["But one after another they all began to make excuses. The first one said, ‘I have bought a field, and I need to go see it. Please excuse me.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But one after another they all began to make excuses. The first one said, ‘I have bought a field, and I need to go see it. Please excuse me.’

contentJson: ["Another said, ‘I have bought five yoke of oxen, and I am going to try them out. Please excuse me.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Another said, ‘I have bought five yoke of oxen, and I am going to try them out. Please excuse me.’

contentJson: ["Still another said, ‘I have married a wife, so I cannot come.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Still another said, ‘I have married a wife, so I cannot come.’

contentJson: ["The servant returned and reported all this to his master. Then the owner of the house became angry and said to his servant, ‘Go out quickly into the streets and alleys of the city, and bring in the poor, the crippled, the blind, and the lame.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The servant returned and reported all this to his master. Then the owner of the house became angry and said to his servant, ‘Go out quickly into the streets and alleys of the city, and bring in the poor, the crippled, the blind, and the lame.’

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: ‘Sir,’ the servant replied, ‘what you ordered has been done, and there is still room.’

contentJson: ["So the master told his servant, ‘Go out to the highways and hedges and compel them to come in, so that my house will be full."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So the master told his servant, ‘Go out to the highways and hedges and compel them to come in, so that my house will be full.

contentJson: ["For I tell you, not one of those men who were invited will taste my banquet.’”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For I tell you, not one of those men who were invited will taste my banquet.’”

contentJson: ["Large crowds were now traveling with Jesus, and He turned and said to them,"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Large crowds were now traveling with Jesus, and He turned and said to them,

contentJson: ["“If anyone comes to Me and does not hate his father and mother and wife and children and brothers and sisters—yes, even his own life—he cannot be My disciple."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “If anyone comes to Me and does not hate his father and mother and wife and children and brothers and sisters—yes, even his own life—he cannot be My disciple.

contentJson: ["And whoever does not carry his cross and follow Me cannot be My disciple."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And whoever does not carry his cross and follow Me cannot be My disciple.

contentJson: ["Which of you, wishing to build a tower, does not first sit down and count the cost to see if he has the resources to complete it?"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Which of you, wishing to build a tower, does not first sit down and count the cost to see if he has the resources to complete it?

contentJson: ["Otherwise, if he lays the foundation and is unable to finish the work, everyone who sees it will ridicule him,"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Otherwise, if he lays the foundation and is unable to finish the work, everyone who sees it will ridicule him,

contentJson: ["saying, ‘This man could not finish what he started to build.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: saying, ‘This man could not finish what he started to build.’

contentJson: ["Or what king on his way to war with another king will not first sit down and consider whether he can engage with ten thousand men the one coming against him with twenty thousand?"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Or what king on his way to war with another king will not first sit down and consider whether he can engage with ten thousand men the one coming against him with twenty thousand?

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And if he is unable, he will send a delegation while the other king is still far off, to ask for terms of peace.

contentJson: ["In the same way, any one of you who does not give up everything he has cannot be My disciple."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In the same way, any one of you who does not give up everything he has cannot be My disciple.

text: Salt is good, but if the salt loses its savor, with what will it be seasoned?

contentJson: ["It is fit neither for the soil nor for the manure pile, and it is thrown out.",{"lineBreak":true},"He who has ears to hear, let him hear.”"]

text:
It is fit neither for the soil nor for the manure pile, and it is thrown out. 
He who has ears to hear, let him hear.”

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Now all the tax collectors and sinners were gathering around to listen to Jesus.

text: So the Pharisees and scribes began to grumble: “This man welcomes sinners and eats with them.”

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then Jesus told them this parable:

contentJson: ["“What man among you, if he has a hundred sheep and loses one of them, does not leave the ninety-nine in the pasture and go after the one that is lost, until he finds it?"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “What man among you, if he has a hundred sheep and loses one of them, does not leave the ninety-nine in the pasture and go after the one that is lost, until he finds it?

contentJson: ["And when he finds it, he joyfully puts it on his shoulders,"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And when he finds it, he joyfully puts it on his shoulders,

contentJson: ["comes home, and calls together his friends and neighbors to tell them, ‘Rejoice with me, for I have found my lost sheep!’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: comes home, and calls together his friends and neighbors to tell them, ‘Rejoice with me, for I have found my lost sheep!’

contentJson: ["In the same way, I tell you that there will be more joy in heaven over one sinner who repents than over ninety-nine righteous ones who do not need to repent."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In the same way, I tell you that there will be more joy in heaven over one sinner who repents than over ninety-nine righteous ones who do not need to repent.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Or what woman who has ten silver coins and loses one of them does not light a lamp, sweep her house, and search carefully until she finds it?

contentJson: ["And when she finds it, she calls together her friends and neighbors to say, ‘Rejoice with me, for I have found my lost coin.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And when she finds it, she calls together her friends and neighbors to say, ‘Rejoice with me, for I have found my lost coin.’

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In the same way, I tell you, there is joy in the presence of God’s angels over one sinner who repents.”

contentJson: ["Then Jesus said, “There was a man who had two sons."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then Jesus said, “There was a man who had two sons.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The younger son said to him, ‘Father, give me my share of the estate.’ So he divided his property between them.

contentJson: ["After a few days, the younger son got everything together and journeyed to a distant country, where he squandered his wealth in wild living."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: After a few days, the younger son got everything together and journeyed to a distant country, where he squandered his wealth in wild living.

contentJson: ["After he had spent all he had, a severe famine swept through that country, and he began to be in need."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: After he had spent all he had, a severe famine swept through that country, and he began to be in need.

contentJson: ["So he went and hired himself out to a citizen of that country, who sent him into his fields to feed the pigs."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So he went and hired himself out to a citizen of that country, who sent him into his fields to feed the pigs.

contentJson: ["He longed to fill his belly with the pods the pigs were eating, but no one would give him a thing."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He longed to fill his belly with the pods the pigs were eating, but no one would give him a thing.

contentJson: ["Finally he came to his senses and said, ‘How many of my father’s hired servants have plenty of food? But here I am, starving to death!"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Finally he came to his senses and said, ‘How many of my father’s hired servants have plenty of food? But here I am, starving to death!

contentJson: ["I will get up and go back to my father and say to him, “Father, I have sinned against heaven and against you."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will get up and go back to my father and say to him, “Father, I have sinned against heaven and against you.

contentJson: ["I am no longer worthy to be called your son. Make me like one of your hired servants.”’"]

text: I am no longer worthy to be called your son. Make me like one of your hired servants.”’

name: Berean Standard Bible

contentJson: ["But the father said to his servants, ‘Quick! Bring the best robe and put it on him. Put a ring on his finger and sandals on his feet."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But the father said to his servants, ‘Quick! Bring the best robe and put it on him. Put a ring on his finger and sandals on his feet.

text: Bring the fattened calf and kill it. Let us feast and celebrate.

text: For this son of mine was dead and is alive again! He was lost and is found!’ So they began to celebrate.

text: Meanwhile the older son was in the field, and as he approached the house, he heard music and dancing.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So he called one of the servants and asked what was going on.

contentJson: ["‘Your brother has returned,’ he said, ‘and your father has killed the fattened calf, because he has him back safe and sound.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: ‘Your brother has returned,’ he said, ‘and your father has killed the fattened calf, because he has him back safe and sound.’

text: The older son became angry and refused to go in. So his father came out and pleaded with him.

contentJson: ["But he answered his father, ‘Look, all these years I have served you and never disobeyed a commandment of yours. Yet you never gave me even a young goat so I could celebrate with my friends."]

contentJson: ["‘Son, you are always with me,’ the father said, ‘and all that is mine is yours."]

text: ‘Son, you are always with me,’ the father said, ‘and all that is mine is yours.

contentJson: ["But it was fitting to celebrate and be glad, because this brother of yours was dead and is alive again; he was lost and is found.’”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But it was fitting to celebrate and be glad, because this brother of yours was dead and is alive again; he was lost and is found.’”

contentJson: ["Jesus also said to His disciples, “There was a rich man whose manager was accused of wasting his possessions."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Jesus also said to His disciples, “There was a rich man whose manager was accused of wasting his possessions.

contentJson: ["So he called him in to ask, ‘What is this I hear about you? Turn in an account of your management, for you cannot be manager any longer.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So he called him in to ask, ‘What is this I hear about you? Turn in an account of your management, for you cannot be manager any longer.’

contentJson: ["The manager said to himself, ‘What shall I do, now that my master is taking away my position? I am too weak to dig and too ashamed to beg."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The manager said to himself, ‘What shall I do, now that my master is taking away my position? I am too weak to dig and too ashamed to beg.

contentJson: ["I know what I will do, so that after my removal from management, people will welcome me into their homes.’"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I know what I will do, so that after my removal from management, people will welcome me into their homes.’

contentJson: ["And he called in each one of his master’s debtors. ‘How much do you owe my master?’ he asked the first."]

text: And he called in each one of his master’s debtors. ‘How much do you owe my master?’ he asked the first.

text:
‘A hundred measures of olive oil,’ he answered.

text:
Then he asked another, ‘And how much do you owe?’ 
‘A hundred measures of wheat,’ he replied. 
‘Take your bill and write eighty,’ he told him.

contentJson: ["The master commended the dishonest manager because he had acted shrewdly. For the sons of this age are more shrewd in dealing with their own kind than are the sons of light."]

contentJson: ["I tell you, use worldly wealth to make friends for yourselves, so that when it is gone, they will welcome you into eternal dwellings."]

text: I tell you, use worldly wealth to make friends for yourselves, so that when it is gone, they will welcome you into eternal dwellings.

contentJson: ["Whoever is faithful with very little will also be faithful with much, and whoever is dishonest with very little will also be dishonest with much."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whoever is faithful with very little will also be faithful with much, and whoever is dishonest with very little will also be dishonest with much.

contentJson: ["So if you have not been faithful with worldly wealth, who will entrust you with true riches?"]

text: So if you have not been faithful with worldly wealth, who will entrust you with true riches?

text: And if you have not been faithful with the belongings of another, who will give you belongings of your own?

contentJson: ["No servant can serve two masters. Either he will hate the one and love the other, or he will be devoted to the one and despise the other. You cannot serve both God and money.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: No servant can serve two masters. Either he will hate the one and love the other, or he will be devoted to the one and despise the other. You cannot serve both God and money.”

contentJson: ["The Pharisees, who were lovers of money, heard all of this and were scoffing at Jesus."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The Pharisees, who were lovers of money, heard all of this and were scoffing at Jesus.
